name: MC Binn
description: '''Jefferson Cristian dos Santos de Lima''' ({{IPA|pt|ˈʒɛfeʁsõ ˈkɾist͡ʃjɐ̃ dus ˈsɐ̃tuz ˈlimɐ|lang}}; born November 1, 1993), better known as '''MC Binn''' ({{IPA|pt|ˌemiˈsi bĩ|pron}}) and previously as '''MC Bin Laden''', is a [[Brazilian nationalism|Brazilian]] [[singer]] and [[composer]] of ''[[funk ostentação]]''.
